message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your enthusiasm. While $11,000 is a good starting point, I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'd be willing to pay $10,500 for the product. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10,800. It's a great compromise, if I do say so myself!
